profile.title: Amaɣnu n useqdac
profile.mustLogin: Ilaq ad teqqneḍ ɣer umiḍan-ik i tedduḍ ɣer yiɣewwaren.
profile.saveError: Aneḍru: ur izmir ara ad isekles iɣewwaren
profile.noPrivateKey: Ulac tasarut tusligt ɣef yibenk-a i tsifeḍ.
profile.setBackupPassword: Sbadu awal uffir i usekles n uḥraz:
profile.importFailed: Tawektart tecceḍ (awal uffir d ucɛuḍ neɣ ifuyla ḥruṣen).
profile.keysRotated: Tigdawin timaynutin ttwarnan u tisarut tazayezt tettwazneḍ.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Tasarut-ik tusligt ur teffɣi ara seg yibenk-a. Sifeḍ ales awwgelhen s wawal uffir akken ad t-terrdeḍ ɣer yibenkan-nniḍen.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Ɣur-k Free — seqdec ifran n Tafukt/Tililit ddaw-a. Leqqem i tekseḍ ugar n isental.
profile.backupDesc: Rnu iḥrazen s wawal uffir i tisdawin-ik, sakin rrud-iten ɣer yibenkan-nniḍen i umtawi.
profile.privacyBlurEnabled: Sɣer iznan s uslɣu s tazwara
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Sɣer ticki asnas ur itteddu ara ɣer sdat
profile.followHint: Tiqsiwin-nsen ad d-banen deg Uḍfaṛ-nnek ma yeznan s iḍaudya n Iḍfaṛen neɣ Azayez.
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Yella wayen ur neddi ara s wudem ameɣtu deg tigezmi-a.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Azen tɣuri d yiznan i wunu n tfellayin-ik neɣ email-ik yettwasentanen. I tɣuri/iznan id-ffɣen yezmer ad ibanen uṭṭun-ik n Chatforia.
profile.forwardSaveFailed: Ur izmir ara ad isekles iɣewwaren
profile.errSmsDest: Fren xerṣa yiwen asaḍas (tiliɣri neɣ email).
profile.errQuietHours: Isragen n usekkut ilaq ad ilin gar 0 d 23.

chat.selectPrompt: Fren aḍris neɣ taxxamt akken ad tebduḍ admeskel
chat.emptySubtitle: Azen izen akken ad tebduḍ adiwenni.

status.postFailed: Ur izmir ara ad yezzen adday
status.filesNote: Ar 5 ifuyla. Tafrast n 24 isragen s wudem amezwer.

sidebar.errorLoading: Ur izmir ara ad d-issali imeslawen

auth.headline: Imeslayen aɣelnawen s tsuqilt tudrt
auth.description: Awgelhen d-yid-yid, tsuqilt s AI, iznan ittruḥen, d tɣuri/tvidyu.

feature.encryption: Awgelhen seg yibenk ad yibenk s wudem amezwaru
feature.privacy: Tabaḍnit d tamezwarut. Isefka-ik d taɣellist-ik.

auth.desktopTip: Ɣef uselkim n tnarit? Scan s tiliɣri-ik i usider n usnas.
auth.subhead: Imeslayen uslig, iwgelhen, d yettwasuqlen — s wakud.
auth.tip: Tzemreḍ ad tesqedceḍ Chatforia deg yal ibenk — neɣ sider asnas i tarmit uffir.
auth.scanHint: Sken s tiliɣri-ik akken ad tesidreḍ asnas neɣ ad teldiḍ di iminig.

home.title: Agejdan
home.subheader: Azen izen akken ad tebduḍ adiwenni.

press.title: Tamedyazt
press.contact: I tistanin n tamedyazt, aru-aɣ ɣer press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: I tistanin n tamedyazt, aru-aɣ ɣer press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia d imeslay amɣellay s tsuqilt s wakud d Awgelhen seg yibenk ad yibenk, i yeg i tmeslayin n umaḍal d uziraz d uswir.
press.assetsText: Ilugan, tuggniwin, d tugniwin n ufaris (ad d-wwalin).

careers.title: Immhal
careers.intro: Nekni d tarbaɛt tamecṭuḥt i tebna imeslay amɣellay, aḍukkal, d UX igerrez. Ma teqdirḍ fell-asen, nḥemmleḍ ad nesla-k.
careers.openRoles: Imeɣriyen yeldin: Tussna (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Aferdis, Tallalt.

about.title: Ɣef Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia d imeslay amɣellay s awgelhen seg yibenk ad yibenk, tsuqilt s wakud, d tɣuri/tvidyu. Tamlilt-nneɣ d tiferkit: ad nebɣu ad neǧǧu imdanen ad mmeslayen — s tɣellist, s tabaḍnit, d gar tutlayin.

values.privacy: Tabaḍnit d tamezwarut: Awgelhen s wudem amezwaru.
values.access: Addukku i yakkwen: Tasuqilt awurman n 100+ tutlayin.
values.control: Asenqed: Iznan ittruḥen d tisentayin n tɣuri d ifrayan.

about.howDescription: Iznan ttuwgelhen ɣef yibenk-ik send ad ffɣen. Tasuqilt, iḥrazen, d umtawi n ibenkan ttwabna akken ad nesɣaṛ ayen i yezmer uqeddac ad yeẓer.

advertise.title: Adellel di Chatforia
advertise.description: Qarreḍ ɣer yiseqdacen n umeslay s tgejdit d tɣellist n tbrandit. Nesumer ibanen n ubeṛṛu deg yidgan i d-bannin, isefka n usponsori, d udellel n uxxam. Imesdamen Premium ur walan adaren.

adsense.withPubId: Akken tura, nesumuz s Google AdSense. Ma tebɣiḍ ad tt-targeteḍ s Google Ads, seqdec ID n umeskar {{pubId}} u ssuter aɣef tasaɣdayt t-medar ɣef idgan-nneɣ ddaw-a. Sponṣora srid tella — seqdec tferkit.
adsense.noPubId: Akken tura, nesumuz s Google AdSense. Sponṣora srid tella — seqdec tferkit ddaw-a.

advertise.noPlacements: Ulac idgan i yettuswel yakan. Rnu-ten di ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Timida tizwaren d uskar deg UI n umeslay
why.brandSafe: Imuddaen imiḍanen n tbrandit; aseǧhed n ufrequenci yettwaḥrez
why.deals: Tudsa srid neɣ s umeskar s AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Tanemmirt! Tasut-ik tettaɣ. Ad nekkeru-ak s kra n wakud.
form.missingRequired: Ma llan, ččar isem, email, d yizen.
form.mailtoInfo: Ad neldi amensa n email-ik akken ad tazneḍ tasut…
form.messagePlaceholder: Targeting, izirazen, KPIs, ismenyifen n yidgan…

upgrade.title: Leqqem
upgrade.subtitle: Fren aselɣas i k-yeɣra: Kkes adaren s Plus, neɣ awi akk timahilin n uzdaw s Premium.

gettingStarted.title: Bdu
gettingStarted.subtitle: Amaynut di Chatforia? Amegrar-a ad yessken iɣewwaren imeẓyan akken ad tiliḍ d ameɣtu deg kra n tesdatin.

alert.text: Amnir-a ad yewǧed ma nezmer ad d-nseḍ awal-imaynut. Ma txedmeḍ ayen ixuṣṣen, ini-aɣ s

section2.title: 2) Bdu ameslay
section2.item1: Rnu DM neɣ Agraw u azen izen-ik amezwaru.
section2.item2: Seqdec tsuqilt s wakud akken ad tmeslayeḍ s 100+ tutlayin.
section2.item3: Ɛreḍ iznan ittruḥen d tisentayin n tɣuri di Amaɣnu → Tabaḍnit.

section3.title: 3) Rnu ugar
section3.item2Part1: Qqen ibenkan-nniḍen u sbadu iḥrazen iwwgelhnen di

account.q: Amek ad rnuɣ neɣ ad rruɣ amiḍan-i?
account.a: Sider asnas neɣ seqdec web, senteḍ “Rnu amiḍan”, senqed email/tiliɣri-ik. I trretsi, seqdec “Tettuɣ awal uffir”.

privacy.q: Iznan d tɣuri d-ttuwgelhen seg yibenk ad yibenk?
privacy.a: Ih. Iznan d tɣuri ttuwgelhen s wudem amezwaru. Kan kečč d win i d-yettmeslayen i yezmen ad tɣurin-sen.

translate.a: Rmed “Suqel s wudem awurman” di Iɣewwaren → Timussni & Tutlayt. Nekwni naseqdec tasuqilt ɣef yibenk ma llan, neɣ s yimeẓlaen tɣellist i yiman-nsen s yisefka ixuṣṣen.

contact.a: Aru-aɣ ɣer support@chatforia.com. Rnu tuggniwin d lqem n usnas-ik.

contact.title: Nermes-aɣ
contact.successMsg: Tanemmirt — tarbaɛt-nneɣ ad d-rrun s email.
contact.errorSend: Ur izmir ara ad yazen. Ma ulac aɣilif, aru-aɣ ɣer support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Tasertit-a tesnifel amek Chatforia (“nekni”, “neɣ” ) tiseddu, tseqdec, u tbeṭṭu isefka mi tessqedceḍ isnasen-nneɣ. Nebnu Chatforia akken ad nsesxdem alqem n isefka i yellan.

infoWeCollect.title: Isefka i nettad
infoWeCollect.account: Talɣut n umiḍan (amedya, email/tiliɣri) i tmerna d tɣellist n umiḍan-ik.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Agbur iwwgelhen (iznan/tɣuri) d awgelhen seg yibenk ad yibenk; ur nezmir ara ad t-nɣi.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Aseɣti/aseqdac am wakken i yecceḍ usnas: ifuyla n uɣelluy, anaw n yibenk, neɣ alqem n unaliyis i wesnerni.

howWeUse.title: Amek nseqdec isefka
howWeUse.provide: Ad nsked d taɣellist n umeẓlu (aqeddac, tifin n ibeddlen/abus).
howWeUse.improve: Ad nesnerni timahilin (taḥsin n tsuqilt, tɣellist).

sharing.title: Beṭṭu
sharing.body: Ur nezzenz ara isefka udmawanen. Izmer ad nbeṭṭu kra n isefka akked imeẓlaen (amedya, push, tḥellilt n useqdac) s yiweɛd uzɣanen.

rights.title: Izernin-ik
rights.body: Ma yella di tamnaṭ-ik (amedya, GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), tzemreḍ ad tessutreḍ asekcem, aseɣti, tukksa, neɣ taskuri ɣef kra n usesfer. Nermes: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Aḥraz n isefka & taɣellist
retention.body: Nḥerrez kan ayen ilaq i tmezla n umeẓlu, u nesqedcen taɣellist n tṣuraf. Agbur awgelhen seg yibenk ad yibenk ur yezmir ara ad yettwazen ɣer-nneɣ.

children.title: Iẓeẓwan
children.body: Chatforia ur yettwagez ara i yimeẓyan ddaw 13 (neɣ akken i tesra leqnut deg tmurt-ik).

changes.title: Ileqman
changes.body: Ad nesuffeɣ ileqman dagi u ad nleqem azemz n “Yettwaleqqem aneggaru”.

intro.body: S useqdec n Chatforia, tqebleḍ tiwtilin-a. Ma ur tetteqebleḍ ara, ur seqdec ara umeẓlu.

accounts.title: Imiḍanen
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Efk talɣut tameɣtut u ḥrez inekcam-ik.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Kečč tesɛa ddmay n wayen yeḍran deg umiḍan-ik.

acceptableUse.title: Aseqdec i yettwaqeblen
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Ulac agbur azerwal, aɛeddi, neɣ i yezmer ad yezger izerfan; ulac spam neɣ abus awurman.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Izmer ad nseḥbes/neks i umiḍanen i yexlef.

yourContent.title: Agbur-ik
yourContent.body: Tebḍuḍ izerfan ɣef ugbur-ik. Ad tmuddeḍ-aɣ izerfan i ilaqen i temhelt n umeẓlu (amedya, abeddel, aḥraz, tsuqilt).

disclaimer.title: Asserḥu & tmezdi
disclaimer.body: Ameẓlu yettwasumer “am yella” war warraten. Ar tama iqqimen s leqnut, Chatforia ur tmezdi ara ɣef tmezdiyin indirekt neɣ yettwaseggten.

changes.title: Ileqman
changes.body: Izmer ad nleqem tiwtilin-a; aseqdec yettcontinuu mbaɛd ileqman yemmal d aqbal.

doNotSell.title: Ur zzenz ara neɣ ur nebḍu ara isefka-inu udmawanen
doNotSell.body: Chatforia ur izzenz ara isefka udmawanen. Imaḍiyen n Kalifornya zemren mazal ad ɣellsen s wudem CPRA s tqeffalt ddaw-a.

cookies.title: Iɣewwaren n kuki
cookies.body: Chatforia iseqdac kukiyen imeẓyanen (amedya, tiɣimit, taɣellist). Ur nseqdac ara adaren n wansay n wegdil. Sefrek kukiyen s yiɣewwaren n iminig-ik.

phoneNumberManager.unableToLoadStatus: Ur izmir ara ad d-issali addad n uṭṭun.
phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: Ulac uṭṭun ittunefk. Fren s taɣzint n waman i beddu n uznan.

startChatModal.title: Bdu adiwenni
startChatModal.nameUsernamePhoneEmail: Aru isem, username, tiliɣri, neɣ email…
startChatModal.searchPrompt: Aru username neɣ tiliɣri sakin sit ɣef Nadi.
startChatModal.saveContactsHint: Tiliɣri/email-ad ad ttwabedlen ticki teskelseḍ-iten d inermisen.
startChatModal.failedBulkStart: Ur izmir ara ad ibdu adiwenni akked wid ittwafernen.

sounds.freeNotice: Ɣur-k Free — imesli uzwiren ttusken wacuɣer macci d yeldin. Leqqem akken ad teldiḍ meṛṛa.

aiSettings.title: Iɣewwaren n AI
aiSettings.controlIntro: Sefrek tsuqilt, tiririt tazirin, d turrist n ForiaBot s wudem awurman.
aiSettings.autoTranslateIncoming: Suqel s wudem awurman iznan id-yekkan
aiSettings.showOriginalAlongside: Sken azawal ɣer tama n tsuqilt
aiSettings.smartRepliesHint: Azen iznan ineggura id-teṭṭfeḍ (ittwasfen) ɣer AI akken ad yessumar iriritin imeqruren.
aiSettings.maskProfanity: Ṣerreḥ awalen n warrac di tiririt n AI
aiSettings.maskProfanityHint: Ma yella, iririten n AI ad sɛun awalen yettwaẓragen yettwaserren
aiSettings.saveFailed: Ur izmir ara ad isekles iɣewwaren n AI
aiSettings.translateTagged: Ala mi d-yettwammel @translated neɣ mi d-yettwacreḍ

accessibilitySettings.title: Adukkal & Ilɣa
accessibilitySettings.accessibilityDesc: Tinefrunin i yeshel Chatforia war uzdam n imesli.
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: Ibded s tiddi tamezwarut. Sɣeṛ ma tebɣiḍ aḍris meqqer di inefran n adukkal.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
Ilɣa imeẓyanen i yiznan & tɣuri
Sken ibanen d ubergani n uzwel akken ur tettxemmimeḍ ara armud.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
Sǧǧel amzzug deg iznan imaynuten (ma yella yettusefrak)
Sker amzzug n yibenk d ilɣa.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
Sker abray n ugdil deg tɣuri i d-yekkan
Aberray aččiq deg ugdil mi d-yarr tɣuri.
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
Sefreḍ asnirew awurman n iznan n taɣect
Rnu tasnirewt ɣer yizen n umeslaw i d-teṭṭfeḍ.
accessibilitySettings.loadFailed: Ur izmir ara ad d-issali iɣewwaren
accessibilitySettings.visualAlertsDesc: Sken ibanen d ubergani n uzwel akken ur tettxemmimeḍ ara armud.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewShort: Amzzug di yiznan imaynuten (ma yella yettusefrak)
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewDesc: Sker amzzug n yibenk d ilɣa.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallShort: Aberray n ugdil di tɣuri i d-yekkan
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallDesc: Aberray aččiq deg ugdil mi d-yarr tɣuri.

privacySection.strictE2EE: Awgelhen iǧehden seg yibenk ad yibenk
privacySection.ciphertextOnlyNote: Sekles kan aɣrud awgelhen ɣef uqeddac. Ad yexsi AI/Tasuqilt d tsedda n umderreḍ.

peoplePage.searchPlaceholder: Nadi s tmazlit, yisem, username, neɣ tiliɣri
peoplePage.quickStartDesc: Kra n iberdan aruraden i lebda.
peoplePage.inviteDesc: Bḍu aseɣwen n tɣri-ik akken ad tebduḍ ameslay mberkan.
peoplePage.getTheAppDesc: Qim ɣer tuqqna s Chatforia i iOS d Android.
peoplePage.syncTip: Tixbula: Iznan-ik ad qqimen ttwasmenṭen gar web d usanas.

randomChat.title: Adiwenni agacuran
randomChat.description: Qqen d win amaynut s tura. Ad ik-nesmhal nekkni u neldi taxxamt askudan.
randomChat.saveGuard: Ala imeslayen gar yimdanen i zemren ad ttwaselsen
